name: F-22 Air Dominance Fighter
summary:
With over 50 person-years of research behind it, F22 Air Dominance Fighter is a realistic simulation of the American fighter aircraft. F22 Air Dominance Fighter combines leading-edge 3-D graphics, a realistic flight model, and true-to-life avionics and weapon systems.
To start, a player can select one of 20 different training missions including takeoffs, landings, mid-air refueling, weapons training, air-to-air combat, free flight, combat formation tactics, and AWACS.

F22 Air Dominance Fighter features three full tours of duty with eight consecutive missions. Players fly a series of sorties over the Red Sea, Eritrea, and Saudi Arabia with scenery ranging from deep deserts to lush valleys.
